goal: Create comprehensive AGENTS.md documentation file explaining the multi-agent orchestration system

completed_steps.title: Create .github/agents/AGENTS.md with architecture overview
completed_steps.action: create_file .github/agents/AGENTS.md with comprehensive system overview and visual diagrams

completed_steps.title: Validate YAML documentation in AGENTS.md matches agent file frontmatter
completed_steps.action: read_file all 5 agent files and validate YAML metadata in AGENTS.md matches
completed_steps.validation: All 5 agents (Smart Plan, Execute, Review, Prep Cloud, Full Auto) YAML metadata validated ✓

completed_steps.title: Ensure confidence scoring formula and signal descriptions are complete
completed_steps.action: Verify AGENTS.md includes Cloud Confidence formula, 5 signals, and all thresholds
completed_steps.validation: Confidence formula C = Σ(w_i × s_i), 5 signals documented, thresholds present ✓

completed_steps.title: Verify all 3 workflow examples (local, background, cloud) are present
completed_steps.action: Verify AGENTS.md contains Example 1 (Local), Example 2 (Background), Example 3 (Cloud) with file-state details
completed_steps.validation: All 3 workflow examples with file-state-driven progression documented ✓

completed_steps.title: Confirm file-state-driven orchestration explanation covers all state files
completed_steps.action: Verify AGENTS.md explains core principle and documents state files (plan_output.json, execution_state.json, replanning_context.json, cloud_prep_output.json)
completed_steps.validation: File-state principle fully explained with all state files documented ✓

completed_steps.title: Verify troubleshooting guide covers 4+ issues with solutions
completed_steps.action: Validate AGENTS.md troubleshooting section includes Issue 1 (vagueness stall), Issue 2 (execution stall), Issue 3 (prompt conflicts), Issue 4 (cloud confidence)
completed_steps.validation: 4+ comprehensive troubleshooting issues with root causes and solutions ✓

observations.execution_summary: All 6 planned steps completed successfully. Step 1 created comprehensive AGENTS.md (1,087 lines) with all required content. Steps 2-6 validated completeness: ✓ YAML metadata for all 5 agents, ✓ Confidence scoring formula with 5 signals and thresholds, ✓ 3 workflow examples (local/background/cloud), ✓ File-state-driven orchestration principle, ✓ Troubleshooting guide with 4 issues. No stalls, no failures. Task complete.
observations.deliverable: .github/agents/AGENTS.md (1,087 lines) - Comprehensive multi-agent orchestration system documentation
